column3:
ACK

Is this enough to remove -Wno-sign-compare from the build? Or are there still a lot of these warnings left even after this?

Still too many left in the headers, to remove -Wno-sign-compare.  Several key classes exported directly to the network assign and test 'unsigned int' types against -1.  A few other warnings require some thinking as well.  My patches get 75% of the warnings maybe.\n
